member.name: T:OrchardCore.Search.Lucene.LuceneIndexingService
member.summary: This class provides services to update all the Lucene indices. It is non-rentrant so that calls from different components can be done simultaneously, e.g. from a background task, an event or a UI interaction. It also indexes one content item at a time and provides the result to all indices.

member.name: M:OrchardCore.Search.Lucene.LuceneIndexingService.CreateIndexAsync(OrchardCore.Search.Lucene.Model.LuceneIndexSettings)
member.summary: Creates a new index

member.name: M:OrchardCore.Search.Lucene.LuceneIndexingService.UpdateIndexAsync(OrchardCore.Search.Lucene.Model.LuceneIndexSettings)
member.summary: Update an existing index

member.name: M:OrchardCore.Search.Lucene.LuceneIndexingService.DeleteIndexAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes permanently an index

member.name: M:OrchardCore.Search.Lucene.LuceneIndexingService.ResetIndexAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Restarts the indexing process from the beginning in order to update current content items. It doesn't delete existing entries from the index.

member.name: M:OrchardCore.Search.Lucene.LuceneIndexingService.RebuildIndexAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes and recreates the full index content.

member.name: T:OrchardCore.Search.Lucene.LuceneIndexingState
member.summary: This class persists the indexing state, a cursor, on the filesystem alongside the index itself. This state has to be on the filesystem as each node has its own local storage for the index.

member.name: T:OrchardCore.Search.Lucene.LuceneIndexManager
member.summary: Provides methods to manage physical Lucene indices. This class is provided as a singleton to that the index searcher can be reused across requests.

member.name: M:OrchardCore.Search.Lucene.LuceneIndexManager.GetTimestamps
member.summary: Returns a list of open indices and the last time they were accessed.

member.name: M:OrchardCore.Search.Lucene.LuceneIndexManager.FreeReaderWriter
member.summary: Releases all readers and writers. This can be used after some time of innactivity to free resources.

member.summary: Releases all readers and writers. This can be used after some time of innactivity to free resources.

member.summary: Loads the index settings document from the store for updating and that should not be cached.

member.name: M:OrchardCore.Search.Lucene.LuceneIndexSettingsService.GetDocumentAsync
member.summary: Gets the index settings document from the cache for sharing and that should not be updated.
